NewsArticle.Title: Oren Ball Fashion Contest
NewsArticle.Content:
Attention all Aislings,
There will be a Fashion Contest held outside of the Oren Main Hall during the last portion of the Oren Ball. Fantastic prizes will be given out to the best dressed male and female.
- Riagan, the "Retired Ant Hunter"
((This will be a role playing event hosted by the Suomi Troupe on 11/16 at 5pm PST))
